v.v: God is the only one who can give me peace in my inner being,
Only he is like a huge rock on which I can be safe;
When will you, my enemies, stop attacking me?
My enemies plan to remove me from my important position so that people no longer honor me.
God is the only one who gives me peace in my inner being;
Only he is like a huge rock on which I can be safe;
God is the one who saves me and honors me.
You my people, always trust in him.
People who are considered to be unimportant are as unreliable as a breath of air;
Do not trust in money gained by extorting it from others;
I have heard God say more than once that he is the one who really has power,
and that he is the one who faithfully loves us, as he promised.

v: and he is the one who saves me from my enemies.
he is like a fortress high up that my enemies cannot climb.
I feel that I am as weak against you as a leaning wall or a broken-down fence.
They bless people by what they say,
but in their inner beings they curse those people.
he is the one whom I confidently expect to help me.
he is like a shelter; my enemies can never reach me there.
because we go to him for safety.
people who are considered to be important also really amount to nothing.
If you put them all on a scale, it would be as if they weighed less than a puff of air.
do not try to gain anything by robbing others.
If you become very wealthy, do not trust in your money.
He rewards every one of us according to the deeds that we do.
